name: Food Club
description: Thanks to Food Club's bevy of international cuisines such as Indonesian ayam penyet, Sichuanese mala xiangguo and Korean hot plate chicken, we're spoilt for choice with every meal.

name: Makan Place
description: Be spoilt for choice at the biggest air-conditioned food court among the tertiary institutions in Singapore.

name: Munch
description: Located at the first floor of Seventy3 and right across from the us stop, the cosy food court is at the cross roads of some of the most popular hotspots on campus.

name: Studio 27
description: The snazzy digital playground features a jamming and sound recording studio that comes complete with a DJ console, digital editing suites, video production studios and Wii stations.

name: Makers'Academy
description: Turn your innovative ideas into real prototypes at Makers' Academy, where 3D printers and craft tools are available at your disposal. You can even approach staff for help or attend crafting workshops!

name: Study Lounge @ 22
description: The cosy corners and plush seats at the new student lounge makes ploughing through group work that much easier!

name: Lien Ying Chow Library
description: Dive in your favoruite bestsellers or find reference materials for your essay at the Lien Ying Chow Library, which sports both a lifestyle library and reference library. There's even a board games corner and an Internet cafe for students to chill.

name: Information Security & Forensics Lab
description: Learn in a campus of the future! Our technologically-enhanced Smart Learning Spaces help prepare you for the digital future.

name: Early Childhood Learning Facilities
description: Innovative learning facilities provide realistic training before early childhood students to go for their practicums at pre-schools

name: TV Studio
description: Equipped with the same technologies used by the industry, our media students are ready to hit the ground running upon graduation. Book slots to access this room in your free time here.

name: Product Design & Innovation Studio
description: Students bring up their ideas to life as they turn their creative concepts into working prototypes in design studios. Book your seat here!

name: Poolside
description: Poolside is the perfect spot for grabbing a bite after working out in our newly minted Sports Complex, with a variety of food sure to satisfy your cravings, even if you are craving a bowl of instant noodles.
